Class ec.ifc.app.ECPasswordField 

java.lang.Object
   |
   +----netscape.application.View
           |
           +----netscape.application.TextField
                   |
                   +----ec.ifc.app.ECTextField
                           |
                           +----ec.ifc.app.ECPasswordField
public class ECPasswordField
extends ECTextField
A TextField subclass that conceals its "password" by displaying a string of the same length consisting of the same character.

ECPasswordField()
Constructs a ECPasswordField with origin (0, 0) and zero width and height.
ECPasswordField(int, int, int, int)
Constructs a ECPasswordField with bounds (x, y, width, height).
ECPasswordField(Rect)
Constructs a ECPasswordField with bounds rect.

charNumberForPoint(int)
Overridden to load the drawable string before computing the character number, then reload the ECPasswordField's password.
drawableCharacter()
Returns the character displayed in place of the ECPasswordField's password.
drawViewStringAt(Graphics, String, int, int)
Overridden to do nothing when the password has been loaded into the ECPasswordField.
intValue()
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
keyDown(KeyEvent)
Overridden to make ECPasswordField edit its password.
replaceRangeWithString(Range, String)
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
selectedStringValue()
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
selectRange(Range)
Overridden to ensure that selecteRange() isn't called with an equal range.
setDrawableCharacter(char)
Sets the character displayed in place of the ECPasswordField's password.
setIntValue(int)
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
setStringValue(String)
Overridden to store the ECPasswordField's password in a different location.
stringForRange(Range)
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
stringValue()
Overridden to return the ECPasswordField's password.
xPositionOfCharacter(int)
Overridden to load the drawable string before computing the position, then reload the ECPasswordField's password.

drawViewStringAt in class TextField
setStringValue 
  public void setStringValue(String aString)
Overridden to store the ECPasswordField's password in a different location. unloadPassword() computes the string the ECPasswordField should display instead.
Overrides:
setStringValue in class TextField
See Also:
unloadPassword

Overrides:
charNumberForPoint in class TextField
selectRange 
  public void selectRange(Range aRange)
Overridden to ensure that selecteRange() isn't called with an equal range. Selecting the same range might cause the ECPasswordField to forget where the selection started.
Overrides:
selectRange in class TextField
